law.catch_line: Execution of process by commissioner, department personnel and persons appointed by commissioner.
law.text: The commissioner, all personnel of the department and all officers and other persons appointed by the commissioner may execute any process issued by a court, enforcing the provisions of this chapter or any law relating to the propagation or protection of fish and wildlife in the same manner as any constable or sheriff. To accomplish that purpose they may call any peace officer or other person to their aid.
law.history: Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 200, sec. 16, effective June 19, 1952. -- Amended 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 68, sec. 10. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1954d-23.
